column4: Brand new to Ubuntu (coming from Fedora). Where is the Firewall Manager?
ufw is the default but it does not have a GUI, gufw is the GUI
hmmm. I just want to open a port.
Yes, it is. and Ubuntu does have a network manager...
You want to access the /var/www from a differnt pc on the same network?
maybe a better option is to change the owner or group of www?
You can do that as well.
One second I will give you commands lol
You need to add yourself to the www-data group
that is the default webroot I thot..
